#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);

    ll int T;
    cin>>T;
    for(int tc=1; tc<=T; tc++)
    {
        ll int n,h,f;
        cin>>n>>h>>f;
        vector<ll int> mv;
        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
        {
            ll int a;
            cin>>a;
            mv.push_back(a);

        }
        mv.push_back(0);
        mv.push_back(f);
        sort(mv.begin(),mv.end());
        ll int mn=INT_MAX;
        for(int i=1; i<mv.size(); i++)
        {
            ll int a= mv[i]-mv[i-1];
            if(a<mn) mn=a;
        }
        cout<<mn*h<<"\n";
    }

}
